data.text: God, e kamaghɨn nɨn azai, nɨ deraghvɨra e damuva en apangkuv.
Eghtɨ nguazimɨn gumazamiziba ganigh nɨn arazibagh fogham.
O God, nan ifongiam, gumazamiziba bar nɨ gifuegh nɨn ziam fɨ.
Nɨ guizbangɨra gumazamizibar araziba tuisɨgha, tuavir aghuim men akazɨ, me nɨn ifongiamɨn gɨrara zui.
O God, nan ifongiam, gumazamiziba bar nɨ gifuegh nɨn ziam fɨ.
Bar guizbangɨra, God deragha e gami.
